Package com.aislab.accesscontrol.jboss.ucon.pep

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContextHandlerService
    This is the Context Handler class which converts JSON Request from Moodle to XACML
    MyObligation
    This class will deal with Obligation tag, stores ObligationId and AttributeAssignment
    PEPResponse
    This class is used in the ContextHandlerService for extracting Authorization Decision from XACML ResultType
    UCONPEP
    UCONPEP Service that intercepts User Request to provide Authorization Decision
    XMLParser
    This class will get Connection URL, User-name and Password from Configuration File And also get Obligation From the Response
